pairing.title: Prepare your Bidet for pairing
pairing.description:
To put your Top Toilet / Bidet WC in pairing mode:

1. Make sure the bidet is powered on
2. Check that the toilet seat is down
3. Press and hold the 'Stop' button on the side panel for 3 seconds
4. Wait for the LED to start blinking (this indicates pairing mode is active)

Click SUBMIT when your bidet is in pairing mode (up to {timeout} seconds).
